description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You (and a friend) are the only soldier(s) standing between an invading alien fleet and the destruction of your entire planet. Defend your homeworld in this action-packed space shooter!
description.short: You (and a friend) are the only soldier(s) standing between an invading alien fleet and the destruction of your entire planet. Defend your homeworld in this action-packed space shooter!
